SELECT order_num, pay_price, app_order.status order_status, product_size number, sku_id, app_order.sku, product_name, main_img, app_order.create_time as create_time, NOW()- app_order.create_time as remain_time, app_order.product_id product_id, ifnull(app_product.status ,0) product_status, ifnull(app_product_sku.deleted ,0)sku_status, app_product_type.name type_name FROM ( ( app_order LEFT JOIN app_product ON app_order.product_id = app_product.id ) LEFT JOIN app_product_sku ON app_order.sku_id = app_product_sku.id ) LEFT JOIN app_product_type ON app_product.product_type = app_product_type.id
(app_order.status ='0' or app_order.status='1')
app_order.status ='2'
app_order.status ='3'
app_order.status ='4'
app_order.status <5
and user_id=#{userId}
ORDER BY app_order.create_time desc
